metadata.Title: CVE-2017-6318 on Ubuntu 16.04 ESM (xenial) - low.
metadata.Description:
saned in sane-backends 1.0.25 allows remote attackers to obtain sensitive memory information via a crafted SANE_NET_CONTROL_OPTION packet.

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2017-6318` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

libsane - 1.0.25+git20150528-1ubuntu2.16.04.3
libsane-common - 1.0.25+git20150528-1ubuntu2.16.04.3
sane-utils - 1.0.25+git20150528-1ubuntu2.16.04.3
No subscription required

criterions.comment: sane-backends package in xenial was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '1.0.25+git20150528-1ubuntu2.16.04.3').
